title: WTB T206 Marquard Arms at Side EPDG Back in VG-VGEX shape
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Marquard Arms at Side EPDG Back in VG-VGEX shape
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I would like to buy or possibly trade for a Rube Marquard Arms at SIde with and EPDG back in VG or VGEX condition.  I would prefer it graded, but not required.  I am a little low on trading stock, but we can see what we can do, or I can purchase.
I see the one on ebay with the big BIN.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
